name: Orzo With Tomatoes
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound ripe plum tomatoes, cored and cut into 1/3-inch cubes
2 tablespoons loosely packed shredded fresh basil or Italian parsley

recipeInstructions.text: Bring water with salt to a boil in a saucepan. Add orzo and cook, stirring, for about 10 minutes or until tender. Do not overcook. Drain.
Meanwhile, heat oil in a saucepan and add garlic. Cook briefly, stirring; do not brown. Add tomatoes, salt and pepper. Stir and cook for 3 minutes. Add orzo, basil and cheese. Blend well and serve.
